details:
adjective
- fully prepared or eager
- far along in time
= synonyms: advanced
- at the highest point of development especially in judgment or knowledge
= example: at the highest point of development especially in judgment or knowledge
- fully developed or matured and ready to be eaten or used
= example: fully developed or matured and ready to be eaten or used
= synonyms: mature
- most suitable or right for a particular purpose
= synonyms: right
